knimeNode.name: Database End CASE
knimeNode.shortDescription: Database connection End CASE node to collect inactive and active branches and return an active port

intro.p: This node provides a database connection equivalent of the End IF node.
NOTE - if multiple active ports are present, they cannot be combined, and the node behaviour is governed by the settings in the node dialog.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

option.name: Select the behaviour when there are multiple active branches

fullDescription.option: Select the mode behaviour if multiple active branches are terminated by the node.
